website_summaries.verdict: This premium straight line reel is constructed specifically with the challenges of ice fishing in mind.
pros: Material made to not feel cold in low temperatures
No worries about twist on your line
cons: With a straight line reel like this one, it can be easy to let out too much line

customer_reviews.title: Star drag wheel flopping around
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box the star drag wheel was loose and flopping around on the shaft. I needed to use it right away so I placed a washer over the star drag wheel and that tightened it up. I don't think this is how it was designed to be. Also I prefer the longer reel seat so I changed it out from the short one (both are included). Could not adjust the drop rate very much but I use very light jigs. Frabil is usually very good stuff, I hope I just got one that slipped through QC.
customer_reviews.author: A new User

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in the performance this year. One of the reels showed up with 2 screws floating around on the inside. The release froze up all the time and if there's a tiny piece of ice anywhere on the line it will malfunction. My black Betty was way better!
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Was excited for the reel which I got in great time. Did the typical reel test and started ...
customer_reviews.text: Was excited for the reel which I got in great time. Did the typical reel test and started spinning the handle to feel how smooth it operated. 2 star for the price with how much play is in the spool, which makes it feel like the reel has gravel in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Giving it away
customer_reviews.text: Can't loosen the spool enough to allow bait to free fall & if you could the spool is enclosed so you can't thumb it.
customer_reviews.author: minnie

customer_reviews.title: Updated review: Absolute garbage, get a 6061
customer_reviews.text: I am updating my review as to this reel being junk. 2 seasons old and two of my seven blew drags out, open spooling and retrieval not working. Frabil recommended cleaning and replacing drags and washers. Are you kidding me? I'm not boating kings on copper here, its a pan fish line. I threw 9 of these in the garbage and bought a dozen 6061 black bettys and couldnt be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: I will be looking to replace them with reels that work better than these do
customer_reviews.text: I had to return one because the line tention adjuster did not work at all. The two o do have the adjustment hardly works. I will be looking to replace them with reels that work better than these do.
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Great Reel
customer_reviews.text: Great real catch fish and get right back in the strike zone quickly.. free spool works great even with a very light jig. .. you do have to babysit it just a little so you don't get any backlashes but overall a great reel .. I would purchase another
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and works  great.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, works great and haven't disappointed me yet. Works great in really cold/freezing weather.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great reel
customer_reviews.text: Reel is simple to use with no issues. Drop button and drag work well.
customer_reviews.author: kevin whiteford

customer_reviews.title: Bent Handle
customer_reviews.text: I received this reel with a bent handle. I was able to fix it, without too much of a problem. Other than that the reel works good.
customer_reviews.author: David Kublik

customer_reviews.title: Ok reel.Good price and replacement was sent quickly
customer_reviews.text: Never used this reel. Came unfunctional with a grinding noise when reeled. Got a replacement and seems to work better.
customer_reviews.author: Pete/ny

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Thing broke just putting line on it! Junk I would not recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Jason Page

customer_reviews.title: We returned both
customer_reviews.text: Both did not work, both were returned in the same box.
customer_reviews.author: Kurtis T.

customer_reviews.title: Once I striped about 70 yards off and left about 30 yards on the reel it worked great. I never had another backlash or tangle th
customer_reviews.text: I used the reel for ice fishing this past season and it worked just as I expected. The only problem I encountered was I spooled too much line on the reel (100 yards). Because of the way the line lays on the spool it caused a few backlashes and tangles. Once I striped about 70 yards off and left about 30 yards on the reel it worked great. I never had another backlash or tangle the rest of the season. I plan on ordering another one of these reels for next ice fishing season.
customer_reviews.author: DAVE S.

customer_reviews.title: Silky Smooth Mechanics!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent excellent mechanics smooth as silk a great ice fishing reel well worth the buy couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Steve La Londe Jr

customer_reviews.title: Drops lures like a rock
customer_reviews.text: Smoother then a cats @$$ when reeling. Drops lures like a rock.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this reel, works great for ice fishing, no twists
customer_reviews.author: Doyle Bunch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This Reel is the best. I would buy it again, No line problems Like a spinning reel.
customer_reviews.author: Leon Regenscheid

customer_reviews.title: Caught 1st walleye (7lb) thought drag acted a little funny but continued fishing
customer_reviews.text: This reel is junk if you're going to use it for larger fish. Took it along on 2nd trip to BOQ Canada ice fishing for walleye. Caught 1st walleye (7lb) thought drag acted a little funny but continued fishing. 2nd fish jumbo perch. Drag acted funny again. 3 rd fish another nice walleye ( I think ). Drag let go completely fish got off and I end up with a hell of a bird nest. Went back to camp and put trusty spinning reel back on. No problems after that. Would not recommend for any fishing
customer_reviews.author: Dougo W

customer_reviews.title: Like the reel
customer_reviews.text: Like the reel, however did buy it used and found a loose screw inside the main body that fell out after removing the spool portion. Guess time will tell as to it's functionality as winter is coming.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: I have 2 of these reels. There is a ...
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these reels. There is a learning curve to using an inline reel, careful to not get a back lash. The guard over the reel lets you palm it freely. I have caught small pan fish and up to a 24" walleye...no complaints. Quick drop and no line twist!!
customer_reviews.author: chris167

customer_reviews.title: I love these reels
customer_reviews.text: I love these reels. The spool is encased so palming the reel or pencil gripping will not stop drag on hook set or a big fish run. Very smooth drag and all features work perfectly. Large spool reduces any line curl and in-line reduces or eliminates lure spin. A big deal with me is the increased line retrieval vs 1-1 reels. This reel is a pleasure to fish with!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M. Bars

product_meta.title: Frabill Straight Line 371 Ice Fishing Reel in Clamshell Pack, Black, One Size
product_meta.description: The 371 Straight Line Reel features a lightweight composite construction for strength and durability that won't feel cold in frigid temperatures, spool guarded to allow palm grip, 3.7:1 reel ratio with super smooth drag and instant anti-reverse. The large balanced spool maximizes retrieval rate and the line feeds straight off of the spool, eliminating line coiling and spinning of tackle. It also has an audible/silent bait alarm switch, ambidextrous over sized reel handle for ultimate control, sub-zero lube ensures smooth operation in the coldest temperatures. Includes a free spool to easily drop smallest jigs.
feature_bullets: Spool guarded reel to allow palm grip
Lightweight composite construction for strength and durability
Composite construction won't feel cold in frigid temperatures
3.7:1 reel ratio with super smooth drag & instant anti-reverse
2:6:1 reel ratio with super smooth drag and instant anti-reverse
5 plus 1 ball bearing reel with Ultra-Fine free spooling
Long stem positions reel away from rod accommodating heavy gloves, and short stem for those who prefer the compact size to palm the reel
Free spool to easily drop smallest jigs

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
